author: sikler
body:
#### PR description:

Adding MessageLogger, LogInfo output and setting 'verbose' flag.
Replaced DIM/DIP DNS to local CMS: cmsdimns1.cern.ch.
Fixed sending messages.

#### PR validation at P5:

Works well, tested with fake data on 8 Nov, details and screen shots
[https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMS/OnlineBeamSpotRun3#8_Nov_2021_new_information_on_lo](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMS/OnlineBeamSpotRun3#8_Nov_2021_new_information_on_lo)
title: Making beamspot DIP server more verbose and additional fixes [12_0_X]
